00064 
00087 class EGS_CIRCLE_EXPORT EGS_CircleShape : public EGS_SurfaceShape {
00088 
00089 public:
00090 
00093     EGS_CircleShape(EGS_Float Xo, EGS_Float Yo, EGS_Float R, EGS_Float R_i = 0,
00094             const string &Name="",EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00095         EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f), xo(Xo), yo(Yo), ro(R_i), dr(R-R_i) {
00096         otype = "circle";
00097         if( dr < 0 ) { ro = R; dr = R_i - R; }
00098         A = M_PI*dr*(dr + 2*ro);
00099     };
00100     ~EGS_CircleShape() {};
00101     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00102         EGS_Float r = ro + dr*sqrt(rndm->getUniform());
00103         EGS_Float cphi, sphi; rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00104         return EGS_Vector(xo + r*cphi, yo + r*sphi, 0);
00105     };
00106 
00107 protected:
00108 
00109     EGS_Float xo, yo, ro, dr;
00110 };
00111 
00112 #endif
